data.message:
I  need help, I am trying to report someone for stalking. His name is Sean  Michael Lopez. He has two accounts. One is Asmodeous M Lopez and the  other is Sean Michael. Now, this person has made extreme and violent  threats against myself and my husband. He has been stalking me through  both profiles but I could not report his Sean Michael because he blocked  me on that one after I threatened with the police. His Asmodeous is  still visible but there is no option for harassment on there. I need  something done about this. I have msged about being harassed in the past  and for a few years now. Now, either this person gets banned from FB or  I will have to take serious legal action.  
His name is: Sean Michael Lopez 
His birthdate is September 7th 1987 
Any help on this matter would be greatly appreciated.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear about this, Shawnon. Because the person you're trying to report has blocked you, the best thing you can do is ask your friend to report them using these steps found in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1BI7EUS. We appreciate you helping us keep Facebook a safe and welcoming place. -Rose

Which option do they choose because profiles no longer look like that. The options are:

Report Content
Report Account
Recover or Close this Account 
Get help with another issue.

With the report account option:
Person is annoying: which only leads to sending spam msgs, spam my friend requests and posting annoying things. 

Which one do they click as there is nothing that pertains to harassment.
